attributes.action: Resign and call a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown, you are an unelected Prime Minister, who is bringing this Great country of ours to its knees.
I call on you to resign as Prime Minister with effect from January 2009 and to call a general election so that the people that you are supposed to represent can decide your future, trust me it will be north of the Scottish border!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
